articles.description: Before the game in May some fans broke onto the pitch, with others being arrested after clashing with police, while United players were prevented from leaving for the game from the Lowry Hotel.
articles.content:
Manchester United are on red alert for a potential protest from supporters ahead of Sunday's crunch clash at home to Liverpool.
Ahead of the corresponding fixture last season United fans broke into … [+2013 chars]

articles.title: EVERTON 0-1 WEST HAM | PREMIER LEAGUE HIGHLIGHTS - Everton Football Club
articles.description: Everton's perfect home start came to an end at the hands of West Ham, who edged an even contest 1-0 at Goodison Park. The decisive goal came from a disputed ...
